<a id="class_LabelSettings"></a>

# LabelSettings

**Inherits:** [Resource](class_resource.md) **<** [RefCounted](class_refcounted.md) **<** [Object](class_object.md)

Provides common settings to customize the text in a [Label](class_label.md).

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

**LabelSettings** is a resource that provides common settings to customize the text in a [Label](class_label.md). It will take priority over the properties defined in [Control.theme](class_control.md#class_Control_property_theme). The resource can be shared between multiple labels and changed on the fly, so it's convenient and flexible way to setup text style.

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_line_spacing**\ (\ value\: [float](class_float.md)\ )
- [float](class_float.md) **get_line_spacing**\ (\ )

Additional vertical spacing between lines (in pixels), spacing is added to line descent. This value can be negative.

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_shadow_color**\ (\ value\: [Color](class_color.md)\ )
- [Color](class_color.md) **get_shadow_color**\ (\ )

Color of the shadow effect. If alpha is ``0``, no shadow will be drawn.

- [Vector2](class_vector2.md) **get_shadow_offset**\ (\ )

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Method Descriptions

<a id="class_LabelSettings_method_add_stacked_outline"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **add_stacked_outline**\ (\ index\: [int](class_int.md) = -1\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_LabelSettings_method_add_stacked_outline)

Adds a new stacked outline to the label at the given `index`. If `index` is ``-1``, the new stacked outline will be added at the end of the list.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_LabelSettings_method_add_stacked_shadow"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **add_stacked_shadow**\ (\ index\: [int](class_int.md) = -1\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_LabelSettings_method_add_stacked_shadow)

Adds a new stacked shadow to the label at the given `index`. If `index` is ``-1``, the new stacked shadow will be added at the end of the list.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_LabelSettings_method_get_stacked_outline_color"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Color](class_color.md) **get_stacked_outline_color**\ (\ index\: [int](class_int.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_LabelSettings_method_get_stacked_outline_color)

Returns the color of the stacked outline at `index`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_LabelSettings_method_get_stacked_outline_size"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[int](class_int.md) **get_stacked_outline_size**\ (\ index\: [int](class_int.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_LabelSettings_method_get_stacked_outline_size)

Returns the size of the stacked outline at `index`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_LabelSettings_method_get_stacked_shadow_color"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Color](class_color.md) **get_stacked_shadow_color**\ (\ index\: [int](class_int.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_LabelSettings_method_get_stacked_shadow_color)

Returns the color of the stacked shadow at `index`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_LabelSettings_method_get_stacked_shadow_offset"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Vector2](class_vector2.md) **get_stacked_shadow_offset**\ (\ index\: [int](class_int.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_LabelSettings_method_get_stacked_shadow_offset)

Returns the offset of the stacked shadow at `index`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_LabelSettings_method_get_stacked_shadow_outline_size"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

Returns the outline size of the stacked shadow at `index`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_LabelSettings_method_move_stacked_outline"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **move_stacked_outline**\ (\ from_index\: [int](class_int.md), to_position\: [int](class_int.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_LabelSettings_method_move_stacked_outline)

Moves the stacked outline at index `from_index` to the given position `to_position` in the array.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_LabelSettings_method_move_stacked_shadow"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

Moves the stacked shadow at index `from_index` to the given position `to_position` in the array.

<!-- classref-method -->
